altTitles.ja: ハレ婚。

description.en: Koharu, tired of all the men in her life being lying, married philanderers, decides to move back home, away from the city. Once there she finds her family saddled with a huge debt and no way out, until a handsome but creepy stranger offers to pay the debt, at the same time asking her to marry him. But, as if things weren't crazy enough, he already has two wives!
description.pt-br: Koharu, cansada de todos os homens em sua vida serem mentirosos ou aproveitadores casados, decide se mudar de volta para casa, longe da cidade. Uma vez lá, ela encontra sua família com uma dívida enorme e sem saída, até que um desconhecido bonito, mas assustador se oferece para pagar a dívida, e ao mesmo tempo a pede para se casar com ele. Mas, como se as coisas não fosses doidas o bastante, ele já tem duas esposas!

description.en: Ge ge's name is You Tiao, Di di's name is Soya. A cute comedy series about their daily lives!

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

description.en:
Two years ago, Yu Sui had his teammate sold out, and had himself criticized by the public. He didn't care about any of it. The only thing he cared about was the kid on his team, Shi Luo. After coming back to China, the two meet again. Yu Sui is starting a new team – will Shi Luo give himself once more to the one who hurt him before? Can there be a new path for their relationship?  
  
"I met you when we were young, and then I lost and found you again. My regrets vanished long ago."

The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)

description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!

altTitles.en: Sexy and Stupid Water Polo Comedy

altTitles.ja: ハンツー×トラッシュ

description.en: Hamaji Youhei, a freshman in high school, lives his life aimlessly, lazing around all day. He can't keep up with his studies, no good at sports and won't stick with anything for long. Besides that he's a pervert who's continuously rejected by girls. A sophomore convinces him into joining a club where he could lunge at girls, fondling and touching all he wanted. Thus he joined the Water Polo Club. Can Youhei, who never sticks with anything for long, find his place in this club?
description.pt:
Hamaji Youhei, é um calouro do colegial, uma vida sem rumo, sem fazer nada o dia todo. Ele não é bom nos estudos, nos esportes e não dura muito tempo em lugar nenhum. alem disso ele é um pervertido que está continuamente sendo rejeitados pelas garotas. um colegial do 2º ano convence ele a entrar em um clube onde pudesse agarrar as garotas, acariciando e tocando tudo o que ele quiser. Assim, ele se juntou ao Clube de Polo Aquático. Pode Youhei, que nunca dura em lugar nenhum por muito tempo, encontrar seu lugar nesse clube?  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/K_hiyokopiyo)
description.es-la:
Hamaji Youhei, es un estudiante de primer año de preparatoria, vive su vida sin ninguna clase de objetivo y sin esforzarse en nada. Tiene malas notas, no es bueno en los deportes y no se involucra con nada por mucho tiempo.

Pero un día, estudiante de grado superior, lo convence de unirse a el club de Waterpolo, donde podría observar, acariciar y tocar chicas todo lo que quisiera. Así, se unió al Club de Waterpolo. ¿Podrá Youhei, que nunca se ha esforzado en nada, encontrar su lugar en este club?

altTitles.ja: 勇者が帰ってきた

altTitles.th: สงครามนักรบผู้หวนคืน

description.en:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
description.fr:
Après avoir sauvé un monde, le héros Minsu Kim revient sur Terre et découvre qu'il a tout perdu. Il décide donc de détruire le monde qu'il avait l'habitude d'appeler ‘chez lui’. Dans son saccage, il tue le héros Jeongsu Park, mais au lieu de mourir normalement, Jeongsu est transporté dans un autre monde. Après avoir tué le roi démon de ce monde alternatif et grandi en tant que héros, Jeongsu revient sur terre, déterminé à se venger de Minsu. Alors que les deux héros se battent avec le destin de leur pays en jeu, qui sortira vainqueur?

description.pt-br:
Após salvar um mundo, o guerreiro Kim Minsu retorna à Terra apenas para descobrir que perdeu tudo… então ele decide destruir o mundo que costumava chamar de lar.

Em sua fúria, ele mata o adolescente Jeongsu Park e sua família. Mas, em vez de morrer normalmente, Jeongsu é transportado para outro mundo, onde descobre que agora é um guerreiro. Depois de matar o rei demônio desse mundo alternativo e aperfeiçoar suas habilidades como guerreiro, Jeongsu retorna à Terra, determinado a se vingar de Minsu.

Enquanto os dois guerreiros lutam com o destino do país em jogo, quem sairá vitorioso?
description.zh-hk:
為了報仇雪恨這唯一念頭而拯救異世界的勇士，雖然拯救了自己，卻拯救不了原本世界的他，決心要殺光毀滅世界的勇士們。 這是關於沒有幸福結局的冷酷現實，以及殺勇者們的勇者的故事。

altTitles.ja: れんげとなると！

description.en: It's been a few months since the neighborhood Chinese restaurant closed down, and when I stopped by for the first time in a while, I found that it had been transformed into a flashy, mysterious restaurant with its old signboard still intact. When I went inside, there was a gal there... This is a story about a Chinatown restaurant where gals are hospitable.
description.ja: 近所の町中華が閉店して数カ月、久々に立ち寄るとそこはかつての看板のまま、ド派手な謎の店に変わっていた。中に入るとそこには1人のギャルがいて……。ギャルがもてなす町中華の物語だ。
description.pt-br: Já se passaram alguns meses desde o fechamento do restaurante chinês do bairro, e quando passei por lá pela primeira vez em um tempo, descobri que ele tinha se transformado em um restaurante chamativo e misterioso, mantendo ainda seu antigo letreiro. Ao entrar, deparei-me com uma garçonete... Esta é uma história sobre um restaurante em Chinatown onde as garçonetes são acolhedoras.

altTitles.en: Let's Be an Adventurer! ~Defeating Dungeons with a Skill Board~

description.en:
Karaboshi Haruki has no presence as far as can be recognized, and so he became an adventurer with only the desire to "stand out." One day, a dungeon appeared under his home in Hokkaido. Coincidentally, he picked up a "Skill Board" with which he can spend skill points to increase his growth rate. Is it possible to become a popular person by obsessively diving into your home dungeon everyday?

Based on the popular fantasy Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer," winner of the 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.
description.ru: У Карабоши Харуки нет ничего, что выделяло бы его из толпы, и поэтому он решил стать авантюристом, желая "отличиться". Однажды под его домом на Хоккайдо появилось подземелье. По случайному совпадению, он нашёл так называемую "панель навыков", в которой он может распределять специальные очки для увеличения скорости прокачки. Сможет ли Харуки стать популярным человеком, одержимо посещая своё "домашнее подземелье" каждый день?
description.pt-br:
Karaboshi Haruki não tem presença, tanto quanto pode ser reconhecido, então ele se tornou um aventureiro com apenas o desejo de "se destacar". Um dia, uma masmorra apareceu sob sua casa em Hokkaido. Coincidentemente, ele pegou um "Skill Board" com o qual pode gastar pontos de habilidade para aumentar sua taxa de crescimento. É possível se tornar uma pessoa popular mergulhando obsessivamente na masmorra de sua casa todos os dias?
  
Baseado no popular romance de fantasia Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer", vencedor do 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.

altTitles.ja: ファントムバスターズ

description.en: High school freshman Eugene Korekishi is an honor student with zero psychic powers who does not believe in ghosts! However, his high school life takes an unexpected turn when he meets a maverick boy named Mogari Shishikuno, who exorcises ghosts by eating them!
description.ja: 高校一年生の是岸遊人（これきしゆうじん）は幽霊の存在を信じない霊感0の優等生！しかし、幽霊を喰らって除霊をするという破天荒男子・宍喰野虎落（ししくのもがり）との出会いをきっかけに、彼の高校生活は思いもよらない方向へ動き出す!!

title.en: Uragirareta Boukensha, Andeddo Toshite Yomigaeri Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: アンデッド・キング 〜底辺冒険者、魔物の力で進化無双〜

altTitles.en: Undead King ~A Low-Ranking Adventurer, With the Power of Monsters, Becomes Unbeatable~

altTitles.ja: 裏切られた冒険者、アンデッドとして蘇り無双する

description.en:
(skills). A power humans can only receive once from god, which is used to fight against monsters.
Chrome, who aspired to be an adventurer while owning a skill that is useless in combat, is unable to throw away his ambition, and is despised for his inability, so he is left in charge of menial tasks and chores for his career.
But, when he is running away from a monster as a decoy, he loses his life. But at that time, his skill activates. The skill (Revival). For one time only, he can come back from the dead, and Chrome miraculously revives as a Skeleton monster, a “Wight”.
Chrome, who despairs at his new body, finds out that as monsters evolve, their appearance changes in accordance, so he decides to evolve as fast as possible. Believing he can regain his human appearance, Chrome spends his days hunting monsters. As a by-product, Chrome gains a multitude of skills, whereas a human can only ever hold one––!
Powerful monster abilities and the intelligence of a human. Overcoming adversity with chance, Chrome once again aims to be the strongest adventurer!

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

altTitles.ja: 半開きさん

description.en: A prequel to Sakurai Norio's Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu. A oneshot about the history of Chii & Hanazawa

altTitles.ja: 破滅のカノジョ

description.en:
Reiko, Kazu and Yukari are three childhood friends with a good relationship. Reiko, the self-proclaimed older sister of the group, tells herself that they are like family, and throws away   
her love for Kazu. As for Yukari, she also has feelings for Kazu. Thus, one day, the relationship between the three begins its gradual descent into madness… A shocking psycho-love story between young people begins!!
description.vi: Đó chính là điều quan trọng mà tôi muốn bảo vệ (hủy hoại). Đây là câu chuyện tình điên rồ giữa 3 người bạn thuở nhỏ Reiko, Kazu và Yukari. Mối quan hệ giữa cả 3 sẽ đi về đâu.

title.en: Hajime no Ippo Gaiden - Naniwa no Tora

altTitles.ja-ro: Hajime no Ippo Gaiden: Naniwa no Tora

altTitles.en: Naniwa Tiger: Hajime no Ippo Gaiden

altTitles.ja: はじめの一歩外伝 浪速の虎

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo has been bullied his entire life. Constantly running errands and being beaten up by his classmates, Ippo has always dreamed of changing himself, but never has the passion to act upon it. One day, in the midst of yet another bullying, Ippo is saved by Takamura Mamoru, who happens to be a boxer. Ippo faints from his injuries and is brought to Takamura boxing gym to recover. As he regains consciousness, he is awed and amazed at his new surroundings in the gym, though lacks confidence to attempt anything. Takamura places a photo of Ippo’s classmate on a punching bag and forces him to punch it. It is only then that Ippo feels something stir inside him and eventually asks Takamura to train him in boxing. Thinking that Ippo does not have what it takes, Takamura gives him a task deemed impossible and gives him a one week time limit. With a sudden desire to get stronger, for himself and his hard working mother, Ippo trains relentlessly to accomplish the task within the time limit. Thus Ippo’s journey to the top of the boxing world begins.  
  
This is a oneshot from volume 84 of Hajime no Ippo.

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

altTitles.ja: はじめの一歩

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

altTitles.ja: 四畳半のいばら姫

description.en:
*By Seishun Scans: WARNING! This series contains scenes that may depict sexual harassment, attempted sexual assault, and/or verbal abuse. Reader discretion is advised!*

---

Shinra has a mother who rarely comes home. Everyday, she pinches her pennies just to survive. Rai, a popular guy from her school keeps bothering her, and she’s getting sexually harassed by the manager at her part-time job. After finally coming home after 2 months, Shinra’s mom promises to stay with her. Rai unexpectedly shows up at Shinra’s part-time job and sees her being sexually harassed. He urges her to quit, but she refuses. Shinra comes home only to find out that her mother has disappeared once again

altTitles.ja: ユメかウツツか

description.en: The main character, Iroha, is a first-year high school student who finds it difficult to talk to others. Even though it’s been about two months since she started high school, she still hasn’t had a proper conversation with any of her classmates. During every break, she quietly slips out of the classroom and heads to the courtyard by the old school building. She does this to meet and talk with a senior she met at the town library while studying for exams. This senior, who is a year older, has become a source of support for Iroha. However, the two of them share a secret...
description.es: La protagonista, Iroha, es una estudiante de primer año de instituto a la que le cuesta hablar con los demás. Aunque han pasado dos meses desde que empezó el instituto, todavía no ha tenido una conversación adecuada con ninguno de sus compañeros. En los recreos, se escapa de clase y se dirige al patio, junto al antiguo edificio de la escuela. Lo hace para encontrarse y hablar con un estudiante de último curso que conoció en la biblioteca del pueblo mientras estudiaba para los exámenes. Este alumno, un año mayor que ella, se ha convertido en una fuente de apoyo para Iroha. Sin embargo, ambos comparten un secreto...
description.fr: Iroha, le personnage principal, est un lycéen de première année qui a du mal à parler aux autres. Bien que deux mois se soient écoulés depuis son entrée au lycée, elle n'a encore jamais eu de véritable conversation avec l'un de ses collègues de classe. Durant la récréation, il sort de la classe en cachette et se rend dans la cour de récréation située à côté de l'ancien bâtiment scolaire. Elle le fait pour rencontrer un élève de terminale qu'elle a rencontré à la bibliothèque municipale alors qu'elle étudiait pour ses examens. Cet étudiant, qui a un an de plus qu'elle, est devenu une source de soutien pour Iroha. Cependant, toutes deux partagent un secret...
description.ja: 主人公は他人と会話することが苦手な高校1年生・いろは。高校入学から約2カ月、いまだクラスの人とまともに話せない彼女は、休み時間のたびに教室を抜け出しては旧校舎側の中庭に向かう。その目的とは、受験勉強をしているときに町の図書館で出会った1つ年上の先輩と話すこと。先輩との交流を支えに日々を過ごすいろはだが、2人にはある秘密があって……。
description.es-la: La protagonista, Iroha, es una estudiante de primer año de instituto a la que le cuesta hablar con los demás. Aunque han pasado dos meses desde que empezó el instituto, todavía no ha tenido una conversación adecuada con ninguno de sus compañeros. En los recreos, se escapa de clase y se dirige al patio, junto al antiguo edificio de la escuela. Lo hace para encontrarse y hablar con un estudiante de último curso que conoció en la biblioteca del pueblo mientras estudiaba para los exámenes. Este alumno, un año mayor que ella, se ha convertido en una fuente de apoyo para Iroha. Sin embargo, ambos comparten un secreto...

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio Kuzuhana-chan

description.en: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr: Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359! Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix. Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja: 男女比率1対359!! 359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!! つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!! コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!! 四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br: Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?! Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.ja: 他校のボーイッシュ彼女

description.en: Daichi and Akira have been childhood friends forever but have only started dating recently. While Akira is very much a tomboy, there are some parts of her that are surprisingly girly?

altTitles.ja: 私に愛を叫ばせて

description.en:
"Do you agree with this love, or are you very much against it?" 

What would you do if you finally found the love of your dreams but it is someone you shouldn't have fallen in love with? 

Ichibana is a girl who is a little bit girly and a little bit hot-tempered. She falls in love with Maki, a plain boy in her class, but just as she is about to confess her feelings to him, she finds out, to her surprise that he has a girlfriend!
description.ja:
「君に愛されたいと想い続けるのは罪なことですか――…？」　

主人公・一花は、ちょいギャルでちょっと気の多い女子。同じクラスの地味目男子・槇くんに恋をするのですが、勢いで告白しようとした矢先、意外にも（失礼！）

槇くんには彼女がいることが発覚！　

彼女持ちに恋するなんて辛いだけ！と思うのだけど――!?　

あなたは恋に賛成？反対？　

きれいごとだけじゃない本音のラブコメディ！

altTitles.ja: かのじょはインキュバス

description.en: This is a love story between a man and an incubus.

altTitles.ja: 愛がなければアイドルできない

altTitles.en: Without Love, I Can't Be an Idol

description.en: SeishunScans: Noa Kuroda worships Ibuki, a member of the super popular idol group ILY, as a god. After ILY's concert, Noa happens to run into Ibuki at a convenience store. When Noa learns that Ibuki is stressed out from being worshiped as a "god" and "charismatic" by his fans, she unconsciously hides the fact that she is an otaku, but...

altTitles.ja: 履いてください、鷹峰さん

description.en:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)
description.ja: 生徒会長の鷹峰さんはスクールカーストのトップ中のトップ、神！　対して、友達も存在感も皆無の白田くんはある日、鷹峰さんの生おっぱいを見てしまう。そこから変わるスクールライフ。――「私にパンツを履かせなさい」なんと鷹峰さんは”未だ穢れ知らぬ乙女（エターナル・バージンロード）”という能力でパンツを脱いで時をかける少女だった。ノーパンではいられない鷹峰さんのクローゼットとして白田くんは鷹峰さんにモモ色おねだりをされ続けるハメに…。
description.ru:
Президент студсовета, Такамине-сан находится на самом верху школьной иерархии. Она — практически бог!  
Однажды Широта-кун случайно увидел обнажённую грудь Такамине. С того момента его школьная жизнь изменилась.  
- "Надень мои трусики для меня"   
В итоге Широта-кун оказался в стеснительном положении из-за розовых пристрастий Такамине-сан.  
  


---

description.pt-br:
A presidente do conselho estudantil, Takamine-san, está no topo da hierarquia escolar, uma deusa! Um dia, Shirota-kun acidentalmente vê os seios nus de Takamine-san. A partir de então, sua vida escolar mudou, sendo chantageado para uma vida de servidão a Takamine-san. ― “Coloque minha calcinha para mim”
Shirota-kun acabou em uma situação difícil devido aos favores cor-de-rosa de Takamine-san.

altTitles.ja: 淫魔の天敵

description.en: The demon queen, Morgamaria, was defeated by humans in her original world and found herself transported to the room of a single adult man living in Japan. Using her enchanting powers, she plans to reclaim her dominance over the world. However, the man she encounters in this new realm is the sworn enemy of succubi——?

After traveling into a historical BL novel, the actor Lin Yan gains a special ability: fast-traveling through a skill called [Escape Death]. His first mission? To secretly orchestrate an attack on Prince Qi Zhen, which leads to the prince becoming the villain. Lin Yan’s first identity in this world is none other than Lin Shou Yan, the prince’s foolish fiancé. But as he plays his role, he accidentally captures the prince’s heart, and his fake death turns out to be the key reason Qi Zhen becomes a ruthless tyrant! A cold, overthinking tsundere prince and his scheming, perverted fiancé—chaos ensues!

altTitles.ja: わたしの恋のはじめかた

description.en:
I want to see the look on Senpai's face when she falls in love.'' 
Chisaki, a reality dating show geek, has formed many couples in her daily life and because of this, everyone calls her Machiapu Senpai (MatchApp-senpai). She had given up on her love life, but Reo-kun, her popular and good-looking kouhai, somehow became emotionally attached to her! While supporting Reo-kun’s friend's love journey, she decides to rehabilitate her own love life with Reo-kun too?!

altTitles.ja: アップデーター～NPCからの成り上がり～

description.en:
The blacksmith NPC ‘Aiden.’

One day, his village gets deleted by the hands of the system moderator and as he and his little sister ‘Elise’ perished, he swore to himself.

I’ll destroy this system with my very hands.

It was then…!

“You have unlocked moderator perms, Moderator Lv. 1”

Aiden wakes up with a new power,

Marking the beginning of his journey as a moderator…!

What will become of Aiden?!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.ja:
鍛冶屋のＮPCエイダン。ある日、システム管理者によって村と唯一の家族である妹アリスを消され、自分も消される最中、「こんなシステム、俺がぶっ壊してやる！」そう誓った瞬間、何者かの手によって生き延び管理者権限まで付与された！ 果たして彼は何者になってしまうのか…！！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.ko:
대장장이 NPC '에이든＇.
어느 날, 시스템 관리자로 인해 마을 전체가 삭제당하고,
유일한 가족인 여동생 ‘앨리스’와 함께 소멸하던 그는
그 찰나의 순간, 다짐했다.

반드시 내 손으로 이 시스템을 무너뜨리겠노라고.
그때였다…!

“관리자 권한을 획득했습니다. 관리자 Lv. 1”

관리자의 권한을 가지고 다시 깨어난 에이든.
관리자로서의 힘을 기르기 시작하는데...!!

에이든은 과연 어떤 존재가 될 것인가?!

2020년 “콘티왕으로 살아남기” 대상 수상작 <업데이터>

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.ru:
Родная деревня главного героя, кузнеца-нпс Эйдена, была подвергнута зачистке модератором системы. В ходе сего бедствия младшая сестра эйдена, эллис, погибает, что становится для него переключателем между мирной жизнью и жизнью, полной жажды во что бы то ни стало уничтожить систему, отобравшую у эйдена его единственную родственницу.
Неожиданно для себя он обретает полномочия модератора и продолжает становиться сильнее, чтобы осуществить задуманное. До какого же уровня сумеет дойти наш герой в погоне за своей целью?

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.pt-br:
O ferreiro NPC "Aiden".

Um dia, sua vila foi deletada pelas mãos do moderador do sistema e ele e sua irmã, “Alice”, pereceram.

Ele jurou para si mesmo: Irei destruir o sistema com minhas próprias mãos.

Foi então que…!
Você desbloqueou permissão de moderador, Moderador Nvl. 1”

Aiden despertou com um novo poder, Marcando o início de sua jornada como um moderador…!

O que será do destino dele?!

description.en:
His strength limited by the magical crest with which he was born, Mathias, the world's most powerful sage, decides reincarnation is necessary to become the strongest of all.

Upon his rebirth as a young boy, Mathias is thrilled to discover he's been born with the optimal crest for magical combat on his first try! Unfortunately, the world he's been born into has abysmally poor standards when it comes to magic, and everyone thinks he's still marked for failure!

Now it's up to Mathias to prove everyone wrong... world's strongest sage-style!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [MANGA UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/457)
description.fr: Dans un certain monde, vivait un homme qui excellait dans les combats magiques, les gens l'appelaient [Sage]. Cherchant la plus puissante magie de combat, il dévoua sa vie à rechercher toutes les magies et arts du combat existant. Mais la conclusion à laquelle il parvint fut cruel, [Mon corps n'est pas fait pour la magie de combat]. Pourtant il n'abandonna pas. Il scella son âme grâce à un art magique, et se réincarna à une lointaine époque. Les connaissances magiques de ce monde complètement différentes étaient à ses yeux incroyablement faible.
description.ru: Вот мир, а в нём живёт преуспевший в магических битвах человек, которого прозвали «Мудрецом». Стремясь стать сильнее, он посвятил себя изучению всех видов магии и боевых искусств, что только были. И в итоге, пришёл он к печальному выводу: «Моё тело не пригодно к магическим битвам». Но не сдался Мудрец. Запечатал душу свою магией, чтобы возродиться в далёком будущем. И узрел он мир изменившийся, в котором теория магии была невероятно низкого уровня.
description.vi: Trong thế giới ma thuật, sức mạnh và tương lai của một pháp sư được xác định trước khi sinh ra thông qua cái gọi là "Dấu hiệu" —của bốn biểu tượng phân loại năng khiếu của con người đối với ma thuật. Than thở về sự thật rằng dấu ấn của anh ta bị coi là không phù hợp cho chiến đấu và chỉ hữu ích cho việc gia tăng ma thuật, một nhà hiền triết vô cùng tài giỏi đã quyết định tái sinh hàng nghìn năm trong tương lai.Tái sinh trong vai Mathias Hildesheimr - một cậu bé sáu tuổi và là con trai thứ ba của gia đình công tước - cậu đạt được dấu hiệu cận chiến mà cậu hằng mong ước. Thật không may, người ta cũng phát hiện ra rằng kiến ​​thức của nhân loại về ma thuật và kiếm thuật đã giảm sút nghiêm trọng trong thời đại này; chỉ những thiết bị ma thuật kém chất lượng mới có thể được tìm thấy lẻ tẻ, trong khi ngay cả những phép thuật cơ bản nhất cũng đã bị lãng quên. Để tăng thêm sự xúc phạm cho chấn thương, dấu ấn hiện tại của anh ấy, từng được ca ngợi là mạnh nhất, giờ bị coi là tồi tệ nhất.Khi Mathias 12 tuổi, kiếm thuật vô song của anh đã đưa anh vào Học viện Hoàng gia thứ hai. Xua tan định kiến, anh ta nhanh chóng tạo nên những gợn sóng trong học viện và hơn thế nữa. Tuy nhiên, nhà hiền triết cũ đã phát hiện ra những dấu hiệu của các thế lực đen tối đang hoạt động trong bóng tối, và với việc nhân loại yếu hơn bao giờ hết, Mathias phải ngăn cản kế hoạch xấu xa của họ.

altTitles.ja: ハダカメラ

description.en:
Because he did not pass his college entrance exam, Kagami Kyosuke cannot stay close to Kojo Hikari, the love of his life. So instead he gets a part-time job near her university and buys an old camera since Hikari is passionate for photography. But as it turns out, that camera also has a secret which will get him involved in all sorts of "exciting" and "awkward" situations especially with Botan Oshikiri, his senpai and co-worker. How will Kyosuke's life play out now?  


---
description.id: Karena dia tidak lulus ujian masuk perguruan tinggi, Kagami Kyosuke tidak bisa tinggal dekat dengan Kojo Hikari, cinta dalam hidupnya. Jadi alih-alih dia mendapatkan pekerjaan paruh waktu di dekat universitasnya dan membeli kamera tua karena Hikari sangat menyukai fotografi. Namun ternyata, kamera itu juga memiliki rahasia yang akan membuatnya terlibat dalam segala macam situasi "menarik" dan "canggung" terutama dengan Botan Oshikiri, senpai dan rekan kerjanya. Bagaimana kehidupan Kyosuke mulai dari sekarang?
description.ja: 高校時代からの片想い相手と仲良くなりたい、けど一歩を踏み出す勇気のわかない香神鏡介。彼女との距離を縮めるために買ったカメラには、ちょっと変わったイケない機能が付いていて・・・ハダカを撮って、誰かに現像する・・・
description.ru:
Провалившись на вступительных экзаменах в университет, Кагами Кёскэ также потерял возможность сблизиться со своей школьной любовью — Кодзё Хикари. Надеясь сохранить с ней связь, он не только устраивается работать в кафе рядом с её кампусом, но и покупает подержанный полароид, чтобы найти общую тему для разговоров с увлекающейся искусством фотографии Хикари. Однако Кагами не знал, что он приобрел очень необычный фотоаппарат…  


---

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢たちは揺るがない

description.en:
It has been half a year since Aini Mikkola, the saintess in training who hails from a barony in the countryside, arrived at the Royal Academy. 

The school is in turmoil. 

The boys, the sons of aristocrats, are at the mercy of Aini's innocent, natural cuteness, while the girls are angry at her disregard for the manners of the aristocracy. In the midst of all this, there were three daughters who were dubbed “the villainesses,” in reference to a popular story. Seraphina, the crown prince's fiancée and the daughter of an upright marquise. Sandra, the noble daughter of a viscount who made their wealth from commerce. Bernardetta, the brilliant daughter of the current Prime Minister's who is a marquise. 

When a sense of disquiet begins to grow in the school, these women finally stand up! To correct Aini's mistakes and to follow their own hearts.

This is a record of the battle between the three “villainesses” and the saintly apprentices, a battle for the way of life of women.

title.en: Tensei shita Onna Mafia wa Isekai de Heibon ni Kurashitai - Asashin Ikka no Hakushaku Reijou desu ga, Denshi to Akuma na Danchou ga Tsukimatottekimasu

altTitles.ja: 転生した女マフィアは異世界で平凡に暮らしたい

description.ja: シェリング伯爵家の令嬢ローゼルは、自分が「マフィア」だったという前世の記憶があった。表向きは「商家」を装っているシェリング家。実は「国家公認の暗殺者一家」であり、ローゼルも暗殺の依頼をこなしていく日々を送る。安全なスローライフを送りたいローゼルだが、責任感と面倒見のよさで国同士の揉め事に巻き込まれていくはめに…！しかも依頼協力のため訪れた騎士団長「アルフレード」と「クラウス」に次第に溺愛されて…！？転生した女マフィアに平和な日々は訪れるのか？

description.en: A gambling addict from a poor background, Seong barely managed to land a job at a delivery company! On his first day, he received a complaint about a misdelivered package, and he rushed out to resolve it. But when the door opens, the customer on the other side seems a little... unusual? Introducing himself as a sculptor, Mintae asks Seong to model for him. And soon, Seong finds himself baring it all—right down to his lower half?! #CrazyXCrazy #ModelXSculptor #ContractRelationship #MuseTop #ImpulsiveTop #HopelessRomanticTop #VirginTop #InsecureTop #HasNothingAtAllTop #CheerfulBottom #LivelyBottom

The Girl with Kansai-accent and the Pure Boy

description.en: Kizuki-kun, a serious boy who grew up in Toukyou, moves to Oosaka to attend middle school. He lives for free with a friend of his mother's, a Kansai-dialect-speaking chatty adult older girl!
description.pt:
Um garoto se muda de sua cidade, uma amiga de sua mãe com um forte sotaque de Kansaiben cuida dele.  


---

description.pt-br: Mangá experimental feito por diferentes artistas, página por página. Cada um só teve a informação da página anterior para fazer a página seguinte. Sentido de leitura oriental.

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.th: ก๊วนป่วนชวนบุ๋งบุ๋ง

altTitles.ja: ぐらんぶる

description.en:
A new life begins for Kitahara Iori as he begins his college career near the ocean in Izu city, full of excitement for his new life. 
He will be moving into his uncle's diving store "Grand Blue." There he finds the ocean, beautiful women, and men that love diving and alcohol. 
Will Iori be able to live his dream college life?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10058/episode/318585) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/306-grand-blue-dreaming)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ «کیتاهارا ایوری» پسری است که برای شروع دوره دانشجویی خود به شهر دریایی «ایزو» می رود؛ او که از روبرو شدن با زندگی جدید خود اشتیاق فراوانی دارد به این فکر است که در فروشگاه لوازم غواصی عموی خود که به نام Grand Blue (گرند بلو) شناخته می شود مشغول به کار شود. آنجا او دریایی پر از دلخوشی را می یابد، دخترانی زیبا را به چشم می بیند و همچنین مردانی که عاشق غواصی هستند و وقت خودشان را به نوشیدن انواع نوشیدنی ها می گذرانند ملاقات می کند. حال باید دید که ایوری می تواند زندگی دانشجویی دلخواهش را در این شهر دنبال کند یا خیر؟!
description.ja: 海沿いの街で一人暮らしを始めた北原伊織は衝撃の大学デビューを果たす。出会ったのは美女とダイビング、そして愛すべき野郎ども！
description.ru: Новая жизнь Китахары Ёри начинается с момента поступления в колледж, который находится на берегу океана в городе Идзу. В предвкушении новых эмоций парень отправляется в дазин своего дяди «Необъятный океан». Здесь его ждет красивый океан, прекрасные женщины и мужчины, что любят дайвинг и алкоголь. Сможет ли Ёри прожить студенческую жизнь своей мечты?
description.pt-br: Uma nova vida começa para Kitahara Iori, que entrou na faculdade perto do mar, na cidade de Izu. Emocionado por um novo começo, ele se muda para casa do seu tio, uma loja de mergulho chamada "Grand Blue". Lá, ele encontra um lindo oceano, belas mulheres, e os homens que gostam de mergulho e álcool... Será que Iori vai ser capaz de viver sua tão sonhada vida universitária? Do mesmo autor de Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu, uma nova comédia começa!

altTitles.ja: デッドロック

description.en:
The latest series by Hiro Mashima is a Demon World Academy Dark Fantasy!!
DEAD ROCK is a demon king training institution that towers over the depths of the demon world.
Yakuto, a young demon, challenges the harsh entrance exam to knock on the doors of DEAD ROCK!!
description.fr: DEAD ROCK se déroule au sein de l'académie sombre et fantastique du même nom, un institut d'entraînement pour les rois démons qui gouvernent les abysses du monde des démons. C'est là que Yakuto, un jeune résident du monde des démons, se lance dans le défi des examens d'admission.
description.ja:
デッドロック、それは魔界の深層にそびえたつ魔王養成機関。
魔界人の若者であるヤクトは、デッドロックの門戸をたたくため、過酷な入学試験に挑む!!

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

altTitles.ja: トニカクカワイイ

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

altTitles.ja: 金魚屋さんのかりそめ夫婦

description.en:
The story of a contract marriage set in an old-fashioned goldfish shop. 

Asahi and Nana are newlyweds who run a goldfish shop. At first glance, they seem to be a normal couple, but in fact, they are a contractual couple who got married because of their mutual interests! They are not true husband and wive,  let alone lovers. And yet...

[I'm sorry. I know this is our first time meeting, but will you marry me?]

altTitles.ja: BUNGO―ブンゴ―

description.en: In a town with no baseball team, young Bungo spends his days throwing the ball he received as a gift against a wall until Yukio Noda, Japanese representative youth baseball player, appears before him and an unexpected showdown ensues! After a chance meeting in middle school, these two enroll in Seio Senior where they struggle to make it to Koshien with everything they have.
description.pt-br: Em uma cidade sem time de beisebol, o jovem Bungo passa seus dias jogando a bola que recebeu como presente contra uma parede até que Yukio Noda, o jogador de beisebol jovem representante japonês, aparece diante dele e um confronto inesperado acontece! Depois de um encontro casual no ensino médio, esses dois se matriculam no Seio Senior, onde lutam para chegar a Koshien com tudo o que têm.

altTitles.ja: メトロイド サムス＆ジョイ

description.en: A comic based on the action game series *Metroid.* Samus Aran, a legendary warrior, and Joey, a young boy who wants to be as strong as his late father, are about to embark on an epic adventure across the galaxy!

altTitles.ja: 花に噛みぐせ

description.en: Even in her second year of high school, she has no friends. A young lady, Suu, who is a "loner" to the extreme, dreamed of a normal, uneventful adolescence. Then one day, a beautiful young man named Yuki appears in front of her. He was a mysterious boy who had lost his memory and was the first friend she had ever made. But what is he really...?
description.ja:
「もしかして、照れちゃいました？」
ぼっちを極めるお嬢様・珠羽（すう）は、何てことない普通の青春を夢見ていた。そんなある日、目の前に現れた美青年・雪。記憶を失ったミステリアスな男の子で、初めてできた友達。そう思っていたけれど、なんとその正体は…！？

「恋愛禁止って言われたけど、恋愛以外は何してもいいってことですよね？」

title.en: Puella Magi Madoka Magica: 10th Anniversary Book Series

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女まどか☆マギカ 10th Anniversary Book

description.en: A series of artbooks in honor of Puella Magi Madoka Magica's 10th anniversary featuring anthology comics by various mangaka.

altTitles.ja: まやか姉さんは噓がつけない

description.en:
Junya is a third-year junior high school student. He's good at sports, but when it comes to studying... well, let's just say he's really bad at it. 

Lately, he's been troubled by something. His childhood friend, Mayaka-nee, has been messing with him in all sorts of ways! Could it be that she actually likes him...? 

Thus begins the romantic comedy where our hero is at the mercy of a deceptive, ever-changing heroine!
description.ja:
中学3年生の純也。運動は得意だけど、勉強はちょっと…というか凄く苦手。

そんな彼には最近、悩みがある。幼なじみのまやか姉さんが、なんやかんやと、ちょっかいを出してくるのだ！まさか俺に気があるってこと…!?

変幻自在の嘘つきヒロインに翻弄される騙されラブコメ、開幕！
description.pt-br:
Junya é um aluno do terceiro ano do ensino médio. Ele é bom em esportes, mas quando se trata de estudar... bem, digamos que ele é muito ruim nisso. 

Ultimamente, ele tem sido incomodado por algo. Sua amiga de infância, Mayaka-nee, tem mexido com ele de todas as maneiras! Será que ela realmente gosta dele...? 

Assim começa a comédia romântica onde nosso herói está à mercê de uma heroína enganosa e em constante mudança!

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja: 内海くんの恋のうた

description.en:
"Wouldn't you like to hear my love song?"

Shiori failed to make friends upon entering school, thus, she spends her time as a loner. The only support for her is the music of her favourite singer "Kanade," and she eagerly awaits the release of his new song. Then, by chance, she finds out that  this "Kanade" is actually her classmate, Utsumi! She can't believe she's about to meet her crush in real life, but to her suprise, once they're face to face, Utsumi asks her to be his girlfriend so he can experience love to be able to write a love song. 

A pure, heart-pounding love story that will make your heart skip a beat!

After breaking up with her trashy ex-boyfriend, Jung Eunkyo spends her days peacefully running a café with her friend Kim Haeda. But then, someone appears to disturb her calm life.

“Sunbae, I like you. I fell in love with you at first sight.”

Lee Jaeheon, a young, handsome man who seems to have a twisted side. Eunkyo begins to feel attracted to Jaeheon, who approaches her without hesitation... But Eunkyo’s life, which was already shaken by this new relationship, gradually begins to experience greater turmoil.

(18+ version)
description.fr:
Après avoir rompu avec son ex-petit ami peu recommandable, Jung Eunkyo passe ses journées paisiblement à gérer un café avec son amie Kim Haeda. 

Mais un jour, quelqu’un vient troubler sa vie tranquille.
« Sunbae, je t’aime. Je suis tombé amoureux de toi au premier regard. »
Lee Jaeheon, un jeune homme séduisant qui semble cacher un côté sombre. Eunkyo commence à se sentir attirée par Jaeheon, qui l’approche sans hésitation… Mais la vie d’Eunkyo, déjà bouleversée par cette nouvelle relation, commence peu à peu à connaître des troubles encore plus profonds.
description.pt-br:
Depois de terminar com seu ex-namorado desprezível, Jung Eunkyo passa seus dias pacificamente administrando um café com seu amigo Kim Haeda. Mas então, alguém aparece para perturbar sua vida calma.

“Sunbae, eu gosto de você. Eu me apaixonei por você à primeira vista.”

Lee Jaeheon, um jovem bonito que parece ter um lado distorcido. Eunkyo começa a se sentir atraído por Jaeheon, que se aproxima dela sem hesitação... Mas a vida de Eunkyo, que já estava abalada por esse novo relacionamento, gradualmente começa a experimentar uma turbulência maior.
